data.title: Joanne Samuel - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Joanne Samuel: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Film and television actress whose most well known role was as the wife of Mel Gibson's character in Mad Max. She also starred in the soap operas Class of '74, The Sullivans and The Young Doctors.

Before Fame

She was a guest on the police procedurals Matlock Police and Homicide.

Trivia

She became vice chairman of BOOMPAA, Blue Mountains Performing Arts Association. She directed a web-series called Stinson Creek before taking on her first feature as a director which was titled Broken.

Family Life

She was born in Camperdown, Sydney, Australia. She married director of photography Nick A'Hern with whom she raised three children.

Associated With
